properties.entry: SELECT POST_NO, USER_ID, IMG_PATH FROM SNS_POST SP JOIN POST_IMG ON POST_NO = POST_NO AND SP.POST_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO SNS_POST(POST_NO, CONTENT, USER_ID , UPROADTIME) VALUES (SEQ_POST_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ?)
INSERT INTO POST_IMG(IMG_NO, POST_NO, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_POST_INO.NEXTVAL, ? , ?, ?)
SELECT POST_NO, USER_ID, IMG_NO, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH PRODUCT_TAG_ID FROM SNS_POST SP JOIN POST_IMG ON POST_NO = POST_NO POST_PRODUCTTAG ON POST_NO = POST_NO AND SP.POST_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT IMG_NO , IMG_NAME, FILE_PATH, FROM POST_IMG WHERE POST_NO = ?
INSERT INTO SNS_COMMENT(C_NO, C_CONTENT, POST_NO, USER_ID, C_UPROADTIME) VALUES (SEQ_POST_CNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?) AND C_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT C_NO, C_CONTENT, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(C_UPROADTIME, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS' ) AS C_UPROADTIME FROM SNS_COMMENT SC JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_ID) WHERE SC.STATUS = 'Y' AND POST_NO = ? ORDER BY C_UPROADTIME DESC, C_NO DESC
SELECT USER_ID, FOLLOWER FROM FOLLOW JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_ID)
